reviews.review: Самая лучшая игра. Лучше игры даже не видел. Можно строить свои уровни, играть с другом, в кооп еще жесты есть. Там можно все

play this game





JUST BUY IT NOW
игра очень нравится наиграл за всю жизнь много но когда купил лицензию по любил ещё больше
sigue siendo de mis favoritos de toda la historia de valve
Skidaddle Skidoodle your simp is now a Potato.

şerefsiz küçük robut bizi satı onun amk
kadın pattiz kızartması oldu
One of the best games i ever played.

Even though I'm not huge into puzzle games, this is one of my all-time favourites. Beautiful masterpiece. Music? Fits accordingly with atmosphere and setting. Story? Brilliant. Mechanics? Fun. Game? Yes. Who wouldn't want to team up the sassy robot you murdered and then rebooted accidentally? Characters are very 3-D and loveable. I need to play Co-Op more, but I did years ago with my brother and I remember having a blast. I need to replay it more. You need to. Everyone needs to.
2 kişiyle güzel vakit geçirebileceğiniz bir oyun
игра топ только 2 чеса с другом не могли найти диск на уровне

In my opinion even better than Portal (1). 
beautiful graphics and extremely well thought through puzzles.
There is no reason why not buy it :]
Can't be bothered to finish it at 8 hours, but it's still good!
Many hours of laptops smushed together on the coffee table, parroting instructions to my partner as they walk off the glowing path for the fiftieth time. Good times.
Honestly one of my most favorite games
considering this is a 2 hour game and I have accumulated almost 200 hours in it, I'd say BUY THIS GAME!
Por fin después de mucho tiempo pude probar portal 2 y lo ame, sus personajes, música y como no sus rompecabezas. Sin duda alguna dale la oportunidad a este juego.
a potato flew around my room
Ótimo jogo. Uma grande aquisição para qualquer um!

명작
퍼즐, 스토리, 멀티, BGM 전부 완벽합니다.
해보면 앎 ㄹㅇ
i thunk with portals and u should too
this is good because its very puzzling. good music and has good jokes. it is based off of portal so its recommend to play portal 1 and has cool co op.
This game goes hard, do NOT feel free to screenshot
If you get confused, its ok, its a puzzle game. You're smart, and if you're not, use a youtube walkthru like everyone else. XP

El juego es realmente bueno y no pude muchos recursos lo unico malo que le encuentro es que si no juegas con un amigo en el multijugador no lo podras disfutar muy bien ( amenos que uses el modo pantalla dividida) porque es muy dificil encontrar un compañero  pero de ay en fuera el juego es buenisimo

Juego estupendo, complementa exitosamente la historia de la primera entrega devolviendo la jugabilidad hermosa que poseía, con puzzles entretenidos. Su version multijugador no se queda atras, ya que permite tener una hermosa experiencia en companía de un amigo.
This game is so fun and, hear me out, AS GOOD OR BETTER THAN THE ORIGINAL. Has a good story too!
Ricky Bobby said it about chewing Big Red, I say it about playing Portal 2
Great game, fun mechanics, and amazing story and comedy, especially at the part where he kills you
Uno de mis juegos favoritos, pensar y entender el lore al mismo tiempo es muy bueno
лучшая игра,особенно когда твой друг ставит не тот портал и вам надо делать всё заново

This game is amazing. It's a puzzle game filled with hilarious dialog and even though it's a puzzle and i'm not a speedrunner every time I play it I just have fun. The feel of the game is fantastic and the main gimmick of the portal gun is spectacular. Overall if you're hesitating on whether or not too buy this game, just do it
10/10 My favorite game
Great game, even better when you get to play it with a friend, 5/7
Valve'in ortaya cikardigi, hikayesi ve puzzle olarak ust duzey muhtesem bi yapim
love the challenges of the game.
Cooles Spiel. Ist ein guter Zeitvertreib und macht echt Spaß mit Freunden.
verrri good game !!! BEST GAME EVER MADE
Increible, tanto el 2 como el 1... Este es un poquito mejor

Una total joyita de Valve, una excelente secuela con una mejora cinematográfica abismal, mejor narración, mejor jugabilidad, mejores puzzles, mejor lore, cooperativo y un hermoso cierre (por ahora) de la saga portal.
Totalmente rejugable a diferencia de su antecesor y un cooperativo muy divertido.

Un juego super atrapante que te hace pensar y ademas divertido, porque cuenta con un modo campaña de un jugador que esta buenisimo asi como su modo multiplayer muy bien hecho. Y aparte de de todo el juego tenes niveles en el workshop para cuandos hallas terminado.
 Otra peculiaridad del juego es que corre en cualquier pc porque esta muy bien oprtimizado.

10/10
My favorite game! Amazing story and game play.
Ajuda muito a passar o tempo e eu adoro a saga dos jogos de portal, eu também joguei o portal 1 mas diferente do portal 1 eu ainda não completei o portal 2 mas ainda vou completar.
This game reminds me of Portal.
the most fun ive had with a game in a while 10/10
This is surely of of the best game i have ever played! So much emotions in one single game. What a storyline. Who would have thought that Wheatley would have betrayed me and GLaDos my saviour? Bravo!
Очень понравилось.  Необычный гемплей, с порталами. Головоломки не сложные хоть и надо подумать. Сюжет простой, но с хорошим юмором и своей атмосферой.
